chat.title: AI Competency Assistant
chat.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI competency assistant. How can I help you with course competencies today?
chat.error: I apologize, but I'm having trouble processing your request right now. Please try again.
chat.messageTooLong: Message is too long. Please shorten your message.
chat.authentication: You must be authenticated to use agent chat
